sqlMap.statement: SELECT COND_VAL_TXT_01 as COND_STR1 , COND_VAL_TXT_02 as COND_STR2 , COND_VAL_NUM_01 as COND_NUM1 , ATTRB_COND_VAL_TXT_01 as VAL_STR1 FROM WF_UTIL_COND WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND WF_BIZ_APP_ID = #bizId# AND COND_VAL_TXT_01 = #condStr1# AND COND_VAL_TXT_02 = #condStr2# ORDER BY COND_VAL_TXT_01, COND_VAL_TXT_02, COND_VAL_NUM_01
